text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mokizimi ugagota kva ne'mo'a, megi'a mono kumapintima agu'afima unefrea kafante'ma asente'naza zafare azerino oti'nenige'za agri ofa pristi vahe'mo'za eri'za tevefima kre fananehu ofane, arimpa fru ofa hugahaze. Hagi agra anante kepri huno monora huteno, ete e'nea kantegati atiramigahie. Hagi ana kafana erionki atre'nageno vuno kinaga omasegahie.
